data.text: @OCO_ireland @issu4u @NAPD_IE @Education_Ire Stay away from kids with this bullshit.
@Franco_Mars_ @OCO_ireland @issu4u @NAPD_IE @Education_Ire long covid , thats a good one 😂 and how long would that be this time

@OCO_ireland @issu4u @NAPD_IE @Education_Ire What purpose is this for? What's it measuring? Without a targeted purpose, this is pointless, save for use as a stick to beat educators when the next pandemic hits. Sincerely, a teacher who is sick of this.
@paperpussies @OCO_ireland @issu4u @NAPD_IE @Education_Ire Dismissive & disrespectful, people are still dying & getting Long Covid.

@AnnePM4 @OCO_ireland @issu4u @NAPD_IE @Education_Ire I’d say they’re a lot more upset about having been made to wear masks all day, not being allowed interact with kids in other classes, no school concerts, no field trips, no after-school activities etc etc. All of that will have done vastly more harm to them than Covid ever did.

@kennymick74 @dcediy @issu4u @NAPD_IE @Education_Ire Hi there, for this project we’re seeking the views of senior primary and secondary school aged students. If you’d like more information on our survey you can drop us a line at communciations@oco.ie. Thanks.
